definition: to talk freely/to discuss without inhibition
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Free coffee refills will give you the chance to fully enjoy yourself and chat to your heart\'s content.
sentences.chinese: 免費的咖啡續杯讓您能盡享個人空間或盡情暢談。

sentences.english: You need to 'find your tribe' and sit with them.
sentences.chinese: 你需要“找到自己的部隊”，並與他們坐下來暢談。

sentences.english: Ask questions about the food as well as the culture and customs.
sentences.chinese: 多聊聊食物之外，還可以暢談中國文化和風土人情。

sentences.english: Discuss together with the friends with this interest animatedly it is my greatest happiness.
sentences.chinese: 與有此興趣的朋友一起暢談是我最大的快樂。

sentences.english: My mouth shall meditate truth, and my lips shall hate wickedness.
sentences.chinese: 的確，我的口只暢談真理，我厭惡虛詐的脣舌。

sentences.english: In this programme he talks about a recent film.
sentences.chinese: 本次節目裏他暢談自己對最近一部影片的感受。

sentences.english: We were talking about the music delightedly all night and we also promised to meet again in the Mid-Autumn Festival next year.
sentences.chinese: 我們暢談了一夜，相約下一年的中秋再來討論音樂。

sentences.english: They sat in a corner and chatted of old times.
sentences.chinese: 他們坐在一個角落裏暢談過去的時光。

sentences.english: Genial face the wind blowing, we talked about life in an episode enjoying themselves.
sentences.chinese: 迎面吹來和煦的風，大家暢談生活中趣事，不亦樂乎。

sentences.english: Pan Yue on the need for public participation on the environment.
sentences.chinese: 潘岳暢談公衆參與環保的必要性。

sentences.english: The school feels, intentnesses communicative, warm smile.
sentences.chinese: 了學校的感覺，心無旁騖暢談，溫暖的笑。

sentences.english: John and I had a two-hour rap session yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我和約翰暢談了兩個小時。

definition: to talk with sb (face to face)/discussion/talk/chat
to get together all at once
